author: Source: This is Local London
title: Downton Abbey creator Julian Fellowes to pick up Emmy special... - This is Local London
text:
The award is given to individuals whose creative accomplishments have contributed in some way to the quality of global television production. The very first International Emmy Founders Award was given in 1980 to the late Jim Henson, creator of The Muppets.
 This is Local London.
